```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(baseballr)
library(janitor)
library(here)
source(here::here("R", "scrape_bref.R"))
```

Step 1 - Get Data
```{r}
games_2021 <- 162

team_abbreviation_map <-
  here::here("data", "team_abbrevation_map.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

standings_2020 <- 
  standings_expanded(2020) %>% 
  filter(tm != 'Avg') %>% 
  mutate(tm = tm %>% stringr::str_sub(start=-3)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, g:w_l_percent, r, ra) %>% 
  mutate(r = as.numeric(r),
         ra = as.numeric(ra)) %>% 
  rename(r_g = r,
         ra_g = ra)

team_batting_2020 <- 
  team_batting(2020) %>% 
  filter(!tm %in% c('LgAvg','LgTot')) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, h, ba, obp, slg) %>% 
  mutate(h = as.numeric(h), 
         ba = as.numeric(ba),
         obp = as.numeric(obp),
         slg = as.numeric(slg),
         iso = slg - ba)

team_batting_against_2020 <- 
  team_batting_against(2020) %>% 
  filter(!tm %in% c('LgAvg','LgTot')) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, h, ba, obp, slg) %>% 
  mutate(h = as.numeric(h),
         ba = as.numeric(ba),
         obp = as.numeric(obp),
         slg = as.numeric(slg),
         iso_a = slg - ba) %>% 
  rename(ha = h,
         ba_a = ba,
         obp_a = obp,
         slg_a = slg)
  
team_stats_2020 <- 
  standings_2020 %>% 
  full_join(team_batting_against_2020, by = c("year", "tm")) %>%
  full_join(team_batting_2020, by = c("year", "tm"))

step1 <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
    mutate(r = (r_g * games_2021) %>% round(),
           ra = (ra_g * games_2021) %>% round()) %>% 
    select(tm, r, ra) 
```

Calculate each team's cluster luck adjustments
```{r}
team_stats_2020 <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(r = (r_g * g) %>% round(),
         ra = (ra_g * g) %>% round(),
         hits_per_run = (h / r) %>% round(3))

mean_hits_per_run <- 
  mean(team_stats_2020$hits_per_run) %>% 
  round(3)

team_stats_2020 <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(runs_exp = (h / mean_hits_per_run) %>% round(),
         runs_a_exp = (ha / mean_hits_per_run) %>% round())

step2 <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(r_adj = (r * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round(),
         ra_adj = (ra * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round(),
         runs_exp = (runs_exp * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round(),
         runs_a_exp = (runs_a_exp * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round()) %>%
    mutate(r = runs_exp - r_adj,
           ra = runs_a_exp - ra_adj) %>% 
  select(tm, r, ra) 
```

Calculate team offense WAR adjustments
```{r}

batting_results_2020 <-
  here::here("data", "2020_batting_results.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war)

batting_projections_2021 <-
  here::here("data", "2021_batting_projections.csv") %>%
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(team)) %>% 
  group_by(team) %>% 
  summarize(war_proj = sum(war)) %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war_proj)

step3a <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  left_join(batting_projections_2021) %>% 
  left_join(batting_results_2020) %>% 
  mutate(war_adj = (war * games_2021 / g) %>% round(2),
         war_diff = war_proj - war_adj,
         r = war_diff * 10) %>% 
  select(tm, r)

```

Calculate Team Pitching WAR Adjustments
```{r}

pitching_results_2020 <-
  here::here("data", "2020_pitching_results.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war)

pitching_projections_2021 <-
  here::here("data", "2021_pitching_projections.csv") %>%
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(team)) %>% 
  group_by(team) %>% 
  summarize(war_proj = sum(war)) %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war_proj)

step3b <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  left_join(pitching_projections_2021) %>% 
  left_join(pitching_results_2020) %>% 
  mutate(war_adj = (war * games_2021 / g) %>% round(2),
         war_diff = war_adj - war_proj,
         ra = war_diff * 10) %>% 
  select(tm, ra) 

step3 <- 
  step3a %>% 
  full_join(step3b)

```

Sum up adjustments
```{r}

apply_adjustments <- function(df1, df2) {
  df1 %>% 
    full_join(df2, by = "tm") %>% 
    mutate(r = r.x + r.y,
           ra = ra.x + ra.y) %>% 
    select(tm, r, ra)
}

team_projections_2021 <-
  step1 %>% 
  apply_adjustments(step2) %>% 
  apply_adjustments(step3)

team_projections_2021 %>% 
  summarize(r = sum(r),
            ra = sum(ra))
```
